attributes.action: Suspend all parking restrictions in London
attributes.additional_details:
With the UK now on lock down due to the 
COVID-19 Virus and Londoners told to stay home and NHS workers having to work long shifts parking restrictions need to be lifted.
attributes.background: Lift all parking restrictions in the London area and treat every day as you would a bank holiday.

rejection.details: This is a matter for individual local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.
